body:
rview has been renamed to rvu, as several other binaries, because of
naming conflicts with other tools of various, mainly Linux,
distributions. Have a look at the distribution-specific documentation,
which should be located in /usr/shared/doc/radiance-*, there may be more
to read there.


Good luck, Lars.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2009-February/005741.html).</sup>
